sub_section_analysis.refined_text:
Breakfast Casserole 
Ingredients: 
• 
6 large eggs 
• 
1 cup milk 
• 
1 cup shredded cheese 
• 
1/2 cup cooked sausage or bacon 
• 
1/2 cup diced bell pepper 
• 
1/2 cup diced onion

• 
Serve with your favorite toppings.

• 
In the morning, stir again and add your favorite toppings.

• 
Stir well before serving and top with your favorite toppings.

• 
Serve with syrup and your favorite toppings.

 
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

 
In a baking dish, layer eggplant slices and meat sauce.

 
Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and 
grated Parmesan cheese.

 
In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, grated Parmesan cheese, basil, and oregano.

 
In a baking dish, layer eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and shredded mozzarella cheese.

 
In a large baking dish, layer diced eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, onion, and tomatoes.

 
1 small onion, sliced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 piece ginger, sliced 
 
2 star anise 
 
1 cinnamon stick 
 
1 tablespoon fish sauce 
 
1 tablespoon soy sauce 
 
8 ounces rice noodles 
 
Fresh basil, cilantro, bean sprouts, lime wedges, and sliced jalapeños for garnish 
Instructions: 
 
In a large pot, bring beef broth to a boil.

 
Divide noodles and thinly sliced beef among bowls.

Ingredients: 
 
4 chicken thighs 
 
1 small onion, diced 
 
2 cloves garlic, minced 
 
1 cup red wine 
 
1 cup chicken broth 
 
1 cup mushrooms, sliced 
 
1 cup carrots, sliced 
 
1/4 cup bacon, chopped 
 
2 tablespoons tomato paste 
 
2 tablespoons flour 
 
2 tablespoons butter 
 
1 teaspoon thyme 
 
1 bay leaf 
 
Salt and pepper to taste 
Instructions: 
 
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).

 
In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and heavy cream (if using).

 
Serve duck with sliced green onions and mandarin pancakes.

 
Top with lemon slices, sliced onion, and sliced zucchini.

 
In a bowl, mix ricotta cheese, egg, salt, and pepper.

 
In a bowl, whisk eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper.

 
Sprinkle cooked bacon, diced onion, and grated Gruyère cheese over the crust.
o Pour batter into small dishes and steam until set.
o Slice potatoes, zucchinis, eggplants, and tomatoes.

o 1 small onion 
o 2 cloves garlic 
o 1/4 cup parsley 
o 1 teaspoon cumin 
o 1 teaspoon cinnamon 
o 1 teaspoon salt 
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper 
o 1 package phyllo dough 
o 1/4 cup butter 
o Oil for frying 
 
Instructions: 
o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until cooked.
o Add cumin, coriander, garam masala, and turmeric, cook for 1 minute.
o Spoon mixture onto toasted bread and serve.
o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.
o Toss spinach with dressing and serve.
o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute.

o Add diced tomatoes, ground egusi seeds, and crayfish powder, cook for 5 
minutes.
o Top with remaining fried onions and bake for an additional 5 minutes.
o Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing.
o Combine with cooked beef and vegetables.

o Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper, cook 
for 5 minutes.
o Toss chicken with the dressing, chopped mint, cilantro, and sliced chilies.
o Add chili bean paste, soy sauce, rice wine, and sugar, cook for 2 minutes.
o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad.
o Mix bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and chopped basil.
o Slice and serve with pita bread and toppings.
o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate.
o Pour chicken and sauce over the bread and serve warm.

• 
Add the chicken, cheese, and coleslaw mix.

• 
Add the chicken, lettuce, and Parmesan cheese.

• 
Layer the turkey, apple slices, and spinach on top.

• 
Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce.

• 
Add the chicken, avocado, and spinach.
